website_summaries.verdict: A surprisingly affordable built-in microwave that doesn't compromise features for price. You have a difficult time finding a model with more to offer for a lower price.
pros: Offers an impressive feature set for a fraction of the price of other models in its class, including a large 2.2 cu
ft. build, 30 cook settings, and 1,200 watts of power
Also has a stylish appearance that makes it look expensive, even though it's not
cons: Some owners found that the lack of a handle makes it awkward to open and close

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Powerful and quiet. We got this as a replacement for our old built in microwave that finally died after 13+ years. We’ve had this one for about a month now and we are still amazed at how quiet it is compared to our old whirlpool that it replaced. Anyway, there’s not much more to say about a microwave. It’s got way more functions than we will ever use and it seems to be a good value as compared to the rest of the stainless built in microwaves out there.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L Steele Jr

customer_reviews.title: Returning the microwave.
customer_reviews.text: It did not fit the space correctly unfortunately. The provider is making me pay for return shipping. Had I know that ahead of my purchase, I would not have taken a chance on it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: joanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement
customer_reviews.text: Replaced 9 year old unit in cabinet mounting. Almost perfect fit. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: DocDon

customer_reviews.title: Functional and Effective
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave. Heats quick and easy to use. Installed as a built in with ease too.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Frable

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good: Cooks/warms food very fast - very powerful oven. Attractive to look at but see below. Not So Good: Door sounds cheap and clunky when it closes. Start and Stop buttons should be on the reversed. Installed with Trim kit and it does not fit flush to the cabinet. Looks funky. Verdict: Inexpensive unit. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Try The Mushrooms

customer_reviews.title: Cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and it’s quite easy to operate. However, construction seems very flimsy and cheap. Button to open door is made of plastic and wobbly. Feels like it’s going to break every time it’s pressed. I’m not counting on this unit to last me more than a couple of years. Framing for my built-in cabinetry still has yet to arrive but cost me almost as much as the microwave itself!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Natale

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this Microwave and anything else by Frigidaire!
customer_reviews.text: Does not come with surround pictured. Is not compatible with the recommended trim kit. Frigidaire WILL NOT speak to me to tell me which trim kit to purchase. AVOID!!
customer_reviews.author: David Delisle

customer_reviews.title: Crooked door
customer_reviews.text: Has a crooked door that rubs the trim kit when opening and closing. Note- Did not contact seller. I don’t even want to know the pain it will be to try and exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Just a few down sides to this model, overall it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so the microwave works great. The Frigidaire customer service line promised this model would fit our old 10 year old metal surround and it did not; no matter what you read, you will most likely have to get a new surround with a new microwave. Also, it beeps incessantly! Our old Frigidaire microwave beeped four beeps when it was done. This one continues to beep until you open the door or press stop. It is VERY annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sheets

customer_reviews.title: It is both efficient and well designed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for an older microwave and to match the newly fitted oven. It matched well and was a no-brainer to install. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Basic is Better
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to find a microwave to fit into our existing cutout and even though it doesn't fit exactly, it's close enough. All I wanted was a basic microwave, which this product is. It's powerful, but the constant beeping when food is done cooking, can be annoying. Overall I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: kkchi

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: received the microwave oven a couple of months ago. it was an easy install, it looks great and works well. recommended.
customer_reviews.author: adre

customer_reviews.title: Runs all the time even when off, scary.
customer_reviews.text: We installed this a week ago and now it runs continuously. The fan, turn table and light run even though it is off. It took longer than 30 days for our house to get done and now we cannot return it. Messaged seller and will do an update if the make this right. At this point it is a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great appliance !
customer_reviews.text: Microwave was a replacement for a defunct built in. Slipped into slot and into base perfectly.. works great. Heats evenly and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia D

customer_reviews.title: It's incredibly powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Wow oh wow does this microwave WORK! My wife and I had to replace our 11 y/o built in microwave and this is our replacement. Burned 3 batches of popcorn trying to get used to a microwave that actually heats evenly and how it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: teresa burns

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Returned due to size not being as advertised but it was a cheap place of junk as well. Not worth anywhere close to what the list price is, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jd

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know how old my last microwave was until we started using this one.
customer_reviews.author: Bo Soderqvist

customer_reviews.title: Its a microwave only
customer_reviews.text: Soo misleading, its a microwave only and you pay extra for the trim kit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a quality product and It looks great
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a built in, & easy to operate
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it operates, & the size for a built in. I do not like the long loud beeps when it’s done.
customer_reviews.author: Sara I

customer_reviews.title: Not really a built in
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with the recommended grill kit. When I finally finished the cabinet and put the microwave into the hole you can see in the picture the feet on the left side completely missed the support. I added two stripes of metal with rivets to support the left side and glued the back legs with caulk.
customer_reviews.author: DSC

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking microwave
customer_reviews.text: The microwave looks nice but took me quite some time to fit into the cabinet. I did not read all the Q&A and didn’t realize it did not come with the trim. Based on the picture I thought it came with trims. The device warms up food quite quick. When closing the door it’s quite loud and makes a loud bang which I don’t quite like.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: once installed.....
customer_reviews.text: ....it works fine. The buzzers/rings after completion will drive you NUTZ if you don't remove the item from the appliance right away. I'm still trying to find a way to shut it off!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: roxie

customer_reviews.title: Sticks out a bit but fits well
customer_reviews.text: The frame sticks out from the cabinet by 1.5 inches in order for venting. The sides are black; thus, they don't attract the eye. Our is on the edge of our island, so it is noticeable. I think this frame kit would work best if it is surrounded on both sides (e.g., wall or cabinets). If installed correctly, it looks as though it is a part of the microwave. Our installer didn't care much so it didn't look right at first. I readjusted its alignment with the microwave, and it looks beautiful head on now.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Sears

customer_reviews.title: Shipper damage.  Not sellers fault
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken and dented. Door wouldn't make correct contact unless you slammed it. If you closed it normally, it would think the door was still open and not work
customer_reviews.author: paul a/v

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy construction
customer_reviews.text: Never used it, going to return it through. The open button feels flimsy for their professional series. Tried this unit to replace my 14yo one that was destroyed by an accident.
customer_reviews.author: ScottF

customer_reviews.title: Blows breakers, doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave worked a handful of times and then started blowing the breaker always. I tried it on different outlets and a new microwave I bought to replace it works fine on the outlet. I don't recommend this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lynskey

product_meta.title: FRIGIDAIRE Built-in Microwave Oven, 2.2, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Features: large Capacity fits a variety of different dishes with sensor cooking, The microwave automatically adjusts power levels and cooking times, removing the guesswork over 30 setting options offer a multitude of ways to meet your cooking needs, including settings for chicken nuggets and snacks easy-to-use one-touch buttons so you can cook baked potatoes, popcorn or add 30 Seconds with the touch of a button 14-3/16" Glass turntable holds big bowls and large casserole dishes Product Technologies: effortless™ reheat: reheat almost anything at the touch of a button. Fits-more™ microwave: extra-large microwave provides 2. 2 cu. Ft. Of cooking space. Smudge-proof™ Stainless Steel: practical has never looked so stylish with smudge-proof™ Stainless Steel, A beautiful finish with an easy-to-clean fingerprint-resistant surface. Specifications: total capacity: 2. 2 cu. Ft. Turntable type: glass turntable diameter: 16. 5 display type: digital Depth: 19-5/8" Height: 13-5/8" Width: 24-7/16" Amperage: 14. 2A voltage: 120V wattage: 1200W

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars76 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
